overview: Prema Pusthakam (English: Book of Love) is a 1993 Telugu film which was partly directed by Gollapudi Srinivas before his death on the set of the film; it was later finished by his father, Gollapudi Maruthi Rao. It featured debutant Ajith Kumar and Kanchan in the lead roles, with Devendran as music composer.
title: Prema Pustakam
